text: Lithocarpus dodonaeifolius is a species of tree in the family Fagaceae. L. dodonaeifolius is a medium-sized tree, up to tall. It is endemic to Taiwan and only occurs in the Hengchun Peninsula in the extreme south of the country. It grows in mixed mesophytic forests at altitudes of . Lithocarpus dodonaeifolius is similar to L. formosanus, and their identity as separate species has been questioned. Molecular genetic methods suggest that they are closely related but distinct species. ==References== dodonaeifolius Category:Endemic flora of Taiwan Category:Trees of Taiwan Category:Endangered flora of Asia Category:Plants described in 1913 Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Lithocarpus dodonaeifolius
